settings.code:
Prescription Lenses

We've been doing that for over 50 years!

Choose the option at checkout and send us your RX.
We'll have a quick 1-on-1 (voice, text, or email) to answer your questions or make a recommendation.
NO sales pressure, just answers.

OR
Ask your preferred vision provider if they will put lenses in prescription ready glasses purchased elsewhere.

settings.subtitle: you can't miss us
settings.title: at the corner of Austin and Wheeler

settings.title: Prescription Lenses
settings.text: We've been doing that for over 50 years.

settings.title: Add your new RX
settings.text: Want to replace the lenses in your favorite frame?

settings.heading: custom for brand
settings.textarea: Include the smaller details of your promotion in text below the title.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.text:
We ship USPS within the United States and US territories.
Contact us directly for international orders.

settings.title: Where is my order?
settings.text: You will receive an email with the tracking #.

settings.title: How long will my order take?
settings.text: Most orders are shipped within 2 business days.

settings.title: Returns & exchanges
settings.text:
Return or exchange unused items within 30 days for a full refund.
We do not except returns without prior authorization.

settings.title: How do I send my order back?
settings.text: Send us a message with your order # and we'll sort the details out together.

settings.title: What if 30 days has passed?
settings.text: Drop us a line with your order # and tell us what's wrong. Sometimes we're able to make an exception, depending on the frame/vendor/timeframe.

settings.title: Insurance
settings.text: Yes, you can use your FSA or HSA card for glasses at our store or online.

settings.title: @ the Store (Houston)
settings.text: Our physical store has a much larger selection and lower average price point as a result.

settings.title: What brands do you stock?
settings.text:
150+ independent optical collections with a focus on unique and hard to find glasses.
Less name recognition, more variety.

settings.title: How long will my lenses take?
settings.text:
Single vision lenses typically take just a few business days.
Progressives take a bit longer.
 
We'll contact you as soon as the order has passed quality control and is complete.

settings.title: Can you order _____ ?
settings.text:
If we stock a collection and the frame is available, we're happy to make a special order for you!
 
Similar to clothing, frame styles and colors change with the seasons. So if you love a pair of glasses, consider getting a backup frame sooner rather than later.

settings.subtitle: Visit the store
settings.title: Buy Glasses in Houston
settings.text:
est. 1963

Smith's offers 2,000+ choices in store with frames starting at $28 and lenses from $40.
